title: Variable Catalog
description: Flat catalog of raw variables extracted from form JSON.

variables.description: List of raw variables with provenance and example values.

name.description: Canonical variable name used in the onboarding workflow.

source_form.description: Identifier for the originating form or file.

field_name.description: Original field name from the extracted JSON or header map.

unit.description: Unit of measurement if known (e.g., cm, percent).

confidence.description: Extraction confidence in the variable mapping (0-1 or 0-100).
